September 12, 2011, Angel reported directly to Jerry

Jerry is a fantastic leader who effectively works with everyone in the organization to attain the Companies strategic goals.  He has a proven track record as a Regional/Divisional Manager overseeing all facets of a national mortgage company.   In that role, he has had responsibility for sales production and operational quality.   He has tremendous knowledge of the industry.  He is a "results oriented" individual managing the bottom line while ensuring the protection of the company assets.  He is dedicated to getting the job done and increasing the knowledge level of those around him.  He truly takes the initiative to go “above and beyond” for not only his Team, but the customers as well.  Jerry is a TRUE PROFESSIONAL and does a great job as a leader of any organization!

summary: For nearly 25 years I've worked in various facets of the real estate industry, helping real estate professionals and consumers alike to exceed their real estate goals. Over the course of my career in real estate, my success can be pinpointed to working effectively with individuals and teams to establish and implement highly successful customer service strategies. Creating a consistent and quality experience for my clients is of the utmost importance.
name: Angel Chambers
